00030 #include "kvi_sysconfig.h"
00031 
00038 #include <stdlib.h> // abort
00039 
00040 #ifdef __GNUC__
00041 
00042         #define kvi_debug(fmt,arg...) qDebug(fmt,##arg)
00043         #define kvi_warning(fmt,arg...) qWarning(fmt,##arg)
00044         #define kvi_fatal(fmt,arg...) do { qFatal(fmt,##arg); abort(); } while(0) 
00045         #define KVI_PRETTY_FUNCTION __PRETTY_FUNCTION__
00046 
00047 #else //!__GNUC__
00048 
00049         // assume MSVC
00050 
00051         #define kvi_debug(fmt,...) qDebug(fmt,__VA_ARGS__)
00052         #define kvi_warning(fmt,...) qWarning(fmt,__VA_ARGS__)
00053         #define kvi_fatal(fmt,...) do { qFatal(fmt,__VA_ARGS__); abort(); } while(0) 
00054         #define KVI_PRETTY_FUNCTION __FUNCTION__
00055 
00056 #endif //!__GNUC__
00057 
00058 #ifdef COMPILE_DEBUG_MODE
00059 
00060         #define KVI_ASSERT(__condition__) \
00061                         do { \
00062                                 if(!(__condition__)) \
00063                                         qFatal("[ASSERT FAILED] (" # __condition__ ") in %s at %s:%u",KVI_PRETTY_FUNCTION,__FILE__,__LINE__); \
00064                         } while(0)
00065 
00066         #define KVI_ASSERT_MSG(__condition__,__message__) \
00067                         do { \
00068                                 if(!(__condition__)) \
00069                                 { \
00070                                         qFatal("[ASSERT FAILED] (" # __condition__ ") in %s at %s:%u",KVI_PRETTY_FUNCTION,__FILE__,__LINE__); \
00071                                         qFatal("[ASSERT FAILED] " __message__); \
00072                                 } \
00073                         } while(0)
00074 
00075         #include "KviDebugContext.h"
00076 
00077         // The following two macros are used to create unique variable names
00078         // by the means of the __LINE__ builtin macro.
00079         // The ## token paste operator must be called inside a macro and must
00080         // preceede a macro parameter. This is why we can't use directly
00081         //
00082         // #define UNIQUEVARIABLE int name ## __LINE__
00083         //
00084         // We need something like
00085         //
00086         // #define PASTE(x,y) x ## y
00087         // #define UNIQUEVARIABLE int PASTE(x,__LINE__)
00088         //
00089         // But this doesn't work since the specification of the token pasting operator is
00090         //
00091         // "If a formal parameter in a macro definition is preceded or followed by the token-pasting operator,
00092         // the formal parameter is immediately replaced by the __unexpanded__ actual argument. Macro expansion 
00093         // is __not performed__ on the argument prior to replacement."
00094         //
00095         // So to actually have __LINE__ expanded we need another level of indirection
00096         //
00097         // #define PASTE(x,y) x ## y
00098         // #define EXPAND_Y_AND_THEN_PASTE(x,y) PASTE(x,y)
00099         // #define UNIQUEVARIABLE int EXPAND_Y_AND_THEN_PASTE(x,__LINE__)
00100 
00101         #define KVI_TRACE_HACK_TOKENPASTE_2(x,y) x ## y
00102         #define KVI_TRACE_HACK_TOKENPASTE_1(x,y) KVI_TRACE_HACK_TOKENPASTE_2(x,y)
00103 
00104         #ifdef __GNUC__
00105                 #define KVI_TRACE_FUNCTION \
00106                                 KviDebugContext KVI_TRACE_HACK_TOKENPASTE_1(ctx,__LINE__)(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__)
00107 
00108                 #define KVI_TRACE_BLOCK(_szBlockDescription) \
00109                                 KviDebugContext KVI_TRACE_HACK_TOKENPASTE_1(ctx,__LINE__)("%s - %s",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__,_szBlockDescription)
00110                 
00111                 #define KVI_TRACE(_szFmt,arg...) KviDebugContext::trace(_szFmt,##arg)
00112 
00113         #else
00114                 #define KVI_TRACE_FUNCTION \
00115                                 KviDebugContext KVI_TRACE_HACK_TOKENPASTE_1(ctx,__LINE__)(__FUNCTION__)
00116 
00117                 #define KVI_TRACE_BLOCK(_szBlockDescription) \
00118                                 KviDebugContext KVI_TRACE_HACK_TOKENPASTE_1(ctx,__LINE__)("%s - %s",__FUNCTION__,_szBlockDescription)
00119 
00120                 #define KVI_TRACE(_szFmt,...) KviDebugContext::trace(_szFmt,__VA_ARGS__)
00121 
00122         #endif
00123 
00124 #else //!COMPILE_DEBUG_MODE
00125 
00126         #define KVI_ASSERT(__condition__) do { } while(0)
00127         #define KVI_ASSERT_MSG(__condition__,__message__) do { } while(0)
00128 
00129         #define KVI_TRACE_FUNCTION \
00130                         do { } while(0)
00131 
00132         #define KVI_TRACE_BLOCK(_szBlockDescription) \
00133                         do { } while(0)
00134 
00135         #ifdef __GNUC__
00136                 #define KVI_TRACE(_szFmt,arg...) do { } while(0)
00137         #else
00138                 #define KVI_TRACE(_szFmt,...) do { } while(0)
00139         #endif 
00140         
00141 #endif //!COMPILE_DEBUG_MODE
00142 
00143 
00144 
00145 
00146 
00147 #endif //_KVI_DEBUG_H_
